description:
Screeps Ant Swarm Bot Statistics Dashboard

Updated for unified stats system with stats.* prefixes.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.cpu.used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "CPU Used")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.cpu.bucket")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.cpu.percent")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.cpu.limit")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /stats\.profiler\.subsystem\..*\.avg_cpu$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Subsystem CPU")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /peak_cpu$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Peak CPU")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /stats\.profiler\.subsystem\..*\.avg_cpu$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Room CPU")

avgCPU = from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /stats\.profiler\.subsystem\..*\.avg_cpu$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "avg_cpu"}))

peakCPU = from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /stats\.profiler\.subsystem\..*\.peak_cpu$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "peak_cpu"}))

union(tables: [avgCPU, peakCPU])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["sub_category"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {sub_category: "Room", avg_cpu: "Avg CPU", peak_cpu: "Peak CPU"})

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.empire.creeps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Creeps")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.empire.rooms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Rooms")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.gcl.level")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.gcl.progress")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.gpl.level")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.system.tick")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.empire.energy.storage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Storage Energy")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.empire.energy.terminal")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Terminal Energy")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /storage\.energy$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Room Storage")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /controller\.progress_percent$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Controller Progress")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "scrape_success")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Scrape Success")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "scrape_success")
  |> group(columns: ["mode"], mode: "by")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "mode", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {mode: "Mode", _value: "Status"})

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /empire\.energy\.(available|capacity)$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Empire Energy Available")

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /empire\.energy\.(available|capacity)$/)
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["stat"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with utilization: if r["empire.energy.capacity"] == 0.0 then 0.0 else r["empire.energy.available"] / r["empire.energy.capacity"] }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "utilization"])

storage = from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.empire.energy.storage")
  |> last()

terminal = from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] == "stats.empire.energy.terminal")
  |> last()

union(tables: [storage, terminal])
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Total Energy"})

import "strings"

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /(rcl|creeps|energy\.available|energy\.capacity|storage\.energy|controller\.progress_percent)$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with metric: strings.replaceAll(v: r.stat, t: "room." + r.sub_category + ".", u: "") }))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["sub_category"], columnKey: ["metric"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {sub_category: "Room", creeps: "Creeps", rcl: "RCL", "energy.available": "Energy Available", "energy.capacity": "Energy Capacity", "storage.energy": "Storage Energy", "controller.progress_percent": "Controller %"})

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /pheromone\.(expand|harvest|build|upgrade|defense|war|siege|logistics|nukeTarget)$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Pheromones")

import "strings"

from(bucket: "screeps")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["category"] == "stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stat"] =~ /(brain\.danger|brain\.posture_code|brain\.colony_level_code|pheromone\.(expand|defense|war|logistics|upgrade|build|harvest|siege|nukeTarget)|metrics\.energy\.harvested|metrics\.energy\.spawning|metrics\.hostile_count)$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with metric: strings.replaceAll(v: r.stat, t: "room." + r.sub_category + ".", u: "") }))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["sub_category"], columnKey: ["metric"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {sub_category: "Room", "brain.danger": "Danger", "brain.posture_code": "Posture", "brain.colony_level_code": "Colony", "metrics.energy.harvested": "Energy Harvested", "metrics.energy.spawning": "Energy Spawning", "metrics.hostile_count": "Hostiles", "pheromone.expand": "P Expand", "pheromone.defense": "P Defense", "pheromone.war": "P War", "pheromone.logistics": "P Logistics", "pheromone.harvest": "P Harvest", "pheromone.build": "P Build", "pheromone.upgrade": "P Upgrade", "pheromone.siege": "P Siege", "pheromone.nukeTarget": "P Nuke"})

title: Screeps Ant Swarm (Unified Stats)
